promptPrefix:
I will give you [KEYWORD] or [TOPIC] to generate relevant FAQ in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
Use a mix of short and long sentences to create a more natural-sounding flow of text.
Vary the sentence structure and grammar to avoid a repetitive, formulaic style.
Incorporate personal anecdotes and other elements that are typical of human writing.
Use idiomatic expressions, colloquialisms, and other language conventions commonly used by humans.

[PROMPT]
title: Generate FAQ for Featured Snippet
